data.text: Kik isungri kuom kiny,
We ngʼat moro ema opaki,
Kidi pek to kuoyo bende pek,
Mirima kwiny to gero pek moloyo,
Kwero ngʼato ratiro ber
Adhonde moa kuom osiep inyalo geno,
Ngʼat moyiengʼ ok dwar mor kich,
Mana kaka winyo mabayo moa e ode
Moo mangʼwe ngʼar gi ubani kelo mor ne chuny,
Kik ijwangʼ osiepni kod osiep wuonu,
Bed mariek, wuoda kendo imi chunya mor
Ngʼat mariek neno masira kabiro kendo opondo,
Kaw law ngʼatno mochungʼne ngʼat mokia kaka singo;
Ka ngʼato ogwedho jabute e lela gokinyi mangʼich,
Dhako ma jakoko
kwerogo chalo gi gengʼo yamo
Kaka nyinyo piago nyinyo,
Ngʼat mopidho ngʼowu biro chamo olembe,
Kirango pi, to wangʼi iwuon ema ineno,
Tho kod kethruok ok rom ngangʼ,
Dhahabu gi fedha itemo gi mach,
Kata bed ni iyoko ngʼat mofuwo e pany,
Bed ni ingʼeyo maber kaka jambi chalo;
nimar mwandu ok sik mochwere,
Ka ongʼad lum oko eka manyien twi,
eka iniyud yie rombe milosgo lewni,
Ibiro bedo gi chak mangʼeny mar diek
